H0.text: In what National Park would you find Half Dome. Zion National Park

H1.text: In what National Park would you find Half Dome. Grand Canyon National Park

H2.text: In what National Park would you find Half Dome. Rocky Mountain National Park

H3.text: In what National Park would you find Half Dome. Yosemite

A4.text: Half Dome is a quartz monzonite batholith at the eastern end of Yosemite Valley in Yosemite National Park, California.
